Let me rephrase. I LOVE Pizza Hutâ€™s original pan pizza that they are known for. â€¦More

name: Therese Mystere Deesse
text: The food was good like any pizza hut, but they kept messing up our order! Not the first time they've done so, that's why we came in person. Yet lo and behold they did it again! I love pizza Hut, but this location, is a no for us.

name: Charlene Sutfin
text: Pizza hut is basically the only pizza place open late around here in Berrien Spring's and they are pretty good! I have not had a complaint as of yet with them! Keep up the great work!

name: Noah Opsahl
text: Surprisingly fast for a pizza hut. Good pizza and friendly service too

name: Jean Kusnir
text: Thank you Crystal & Delivery staff for your excellent service and providing the airport with the Veggie Lovers pizza!  We appreciate your service and kindness.   Andrews University Department of Aviation.

name: Tommy The Mover
text: Refused to add a topping charge so I could have mushroom and pineapple on my cheese sticks. What happened to the customer is always right. First time I have ever been refused this request at a pizza hut even first time at this pizza hut. I â€¦More

name: Richard Camacho
text: They went above and beyond to help us get our order. They gave a substitute that was better than what they could not fill on our order. Kudos!

name: Joe Bianchi
text: Not impressed, it was better in the 90's, it used to cost more as well, but the $5 pizza market forced them to cut back quality flavors just to compete. Back to the family owned restaurants for me.

name: Sid Stapleton
text: We got the 2 for ten deal and they we're a little behind so the manager gave us a free order of bread sticks and that was awsome!

name: Anthony Cartier
text: I have never been to Pizza Hut in my life don't know why they asked me but I'll give you five stars anyway

name: James Boundey
text: Fast friendly service! Carry out or delivery only for the most part though there is a small outdoor eating area. This is a great location!

name: Marsha Leon
text: They said it would be delivered in 40 minutes and it came in 20. I thought that was a good thing, but I think it came earlier because they took it out of the oven early. I found the crust to be very mushy! This was my first pizza in the area and my last time ordering from here. Next!

name: Arturo Uscanga
text: very good service and fast service you do not expect much I recommend them.

name: Patricia Akenberger
text: Very disappointing crust was nearly raw and pizza sauce was too spicy. Hadn't had pizza from Pizza Hut in sometime probably won't have again ðŸ˜žðŸ˜ŸðŸ¤’

name: Christine Green
text: Will never order from there again. Workers are rude and last time found hair in our pizza and was over cooked and called and took alot longer then what was told and looked like someone took a bite out of it. Would not recommend going to this one. M139 pizza hut is way better, better service.

name: Colter Slikkers
text: Wish I could get delivery on weekends

text: Terrible cst again. Looks like old flat or frozen dough. Tasted terrible. This is not the first time either. Itâ€™s hit or miss. No consistency in quality

text: This store is small but awesome! Staff is super friendly. All positive experiences! Go above and beyond expectationsâ€”driving in ridiculous weather, bringing extra plates etc.

text: Order was perfect and pizza good and hot.

text: I ORDERED AT 20:25 & ALL BECAUSE THEY MADE A MISTAKE WITH MY NUMBER, I CALLED 2+ HRS LATER ONLY TO BE TOLD Iâ€™D GET A DISCOUNT BUT IT WOULD BE DELIVERED GUARANTEED & IT IS CURRENTLY 00:25, BUT THESE JERKS HAVENâ€™T DELIVERED MY FOOD. DO NOT ORDER FROM THEM. THEY ARE LIARS. I EXPECT A FULL REFUND AND A FREE MEAL WITH EXTRAS.

name: Loretta Nave
text: So disappointed in my work order today.  I asked for the pizza to be delivered at 11:45 for a 12:00 meeting and it arrived at 11:15.   I also saw online that pizzas were $6.99 for mediums.    I called and placed my order but when the bill â€¦More

text: Surprisingly great pizza. Better than the regional Domino's and friendly staff!

name: C Emerson
text: Good pizza & service.

name: gregucho969
text: Three topping pizza ready in 15 minutes! Great place.

name: Ginger Ebanks
text: The customer service was great and the order came a lot quicker than the usual wait time.

name: macy mcvay
text: I mean, Pizza hut. It's not bad, not great. Good service, quick delivery.

name: Donnie Keele III
text: Other Pizza Hut's I love you and Ima let you finish...but this is the worst Pizza Hut of all time...OF ALL TIME! Consistently terrible customer service which wouldn't be as bad if the pizza they made was incredible. I drive out of town to â€¦More

name: Joel Mbungu
text: They messed up a delivery order of mine. All I want is my order remade. The store manager said he could only give me a $5 coupon. What a joke

name: Bree Cox
text: Great delivery service. Nice person. Very understanding. ðŸ˜€

text: Very fast and friendly service..

name: Susanne Lake
text: Wouldn't take my coupon from the University next door.  Was rude about it.  Pizza was very good though.

name: Nicole Hall
text: No seating, no salads, outdated. Good service, has a drive thru.

name: Mwila Mwenya
text: The pizza is awesome!!! The service is excellent!!! Who ever hasn't tried this pizza is missing out.

name: Nicolas Paz
text: We've never had issues with this place. The food is made on time, and their staff are friendly. Their delivery service is usually on time too.

name: Serghei SD
text: Second pizza from them.... never more! Wrong ingredients, the ingredients cut probably with an ax and thrown a heap. Not tasty at all.

name: Darrin Jillson
text: This is a take out Pizza Hut with no in building seating. The food is very consistent with other Pizza Hut locations.
